channel.title: Player reset prob [pi]
channel.description: players on my server are sometimes getting reset, is there a way i can put a command in like ::save and then when they get reset they can do ::backup to restore from their last ::save?

item.title: Player reset prob [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You can make a command for this yes.

I will not spoonfeed you it but I will give you a hintâ€¦

You will need to make a void somewhere that synchronizes the saving method. Then just creating the command is easy.

Read full topic
